#version 120
const float[3] lut1 = float[3]( 0.1, 0.2, 0.3);
const vec2[2] lut2 = vec2[2]( vec2( 0.1, 0.2), vec2( 0.2, 0.3));
#line 3
const vec4[1] lut4 = vec4[1]( vec4( 0.1, 0.2, 0.3, 0.4));
#line 5
vec4 xlat_main(  ) {
    #line 7
    vec4 c = vec4( 0.0);
    int i = 0;
    for ( ; (i < 3); (++i)) {
        c.x += lut1[i];
    }
    int i_1 = 0;
    for ( ; (i_1 < 2); (++i_1)) {
        c.xy += lut2[i_1];
    }
    #line 12
    c += lut4[0];
    return c;
}
void main() {
    vec4 xl_retval;
    xl_retval = xlat_main( );
    gl_FragData[0] = vec4(xl_retval);
}
